weather_report:
As darkness envelops Downtown San Francisco, the remnants of a foggy day give way to a calm and cool evening. The skyline stands illuminated, punctuated by the gentle glow of city lights, while a soft drizzle drifts in from the west—an intriguing precursor to tonight's patchy drizzle. With temperatures hovering around a comfortable 58 degrees, a light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve you well as the winds whisper through the streets, hinting at the west-southwest's gentle touch.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the early morning drizzle will dissipate, granting the day a fresh start soaked in sunshine. The high of 69 promises warmth, though the afternoon may usher in a slight coolness as temperatures fall back to a mellow 66. As the skies embrace clarity, it’s a wonderful opportunity to engage in the simple pleasures that the city has to offer. Consider a leisurely stroll through one of the parks, perhaps a visit to the Ferry Building, where artisanal delights await, or even a quiet moment with a book at one of the cozy local cafes. Dress in layers to navigate the shifting temperatures, and let the day unfold with ease, ever mindful of the soothing sounds and sights of this iconic city.
